version_description:
Sweat is changing the lives of women worldwide. Now, it’s even better!

We listened to your feedback. The SWEAT and BBG Communities can enjoy continued updates to the look and feel of Sweat.

Love Sweat? Rate us with 5 stars and share your love with the Community!

WELCOME TO THE NEW SWEAT - More workouts, more trainers, more SWEAT!

Sweat continues to reshape the fitness industry by expanding the Sweat app to include multiple programs and trainers so you can train how you want, when you want. You can now workout alongside Kayla Itsines, Sjana Elise and Kelsey Wells.

Sweat is the go-to place for women’s health and fitness, now hosting multiple trainers and programs:
• Kayla Itsines’ BBG program includes high-intensity plyometric training using minimal space & equipment. Kayla has also developed a NEW program, BBG Stronger, a weights-based program for gym goers or BBG girls looking for a new challenge.
• Sjana Elise Earp’s BAM (Body and Mind) Yoga program includes vinyasa-style resistance flows and yin-based recovery to improve strength, flexibility and posture.
• Kelsey Wells’ SELF Post-Pregnancy program includes resistance workouts designed to increase core strength and improve posture for women post-pregnancy.

Along with 3 new programs and 2 new trainers that have joined the Sweat app, Sweat has also had a complete makeover and is more user friendly and advanced than ever.

Love the new Sweat? Rate us with 5 stars and share your love with the Community!

Sweat continues to reshape the fitness industry by expanding the Sweat app to include multiple programs and trainers so you can train how you want, when you want. You can now workout alongside Kayla Itsines, Sjana Elise and Kelsey Wells.

Sweat is the go-to place for women’s health and fitness, now hosting multiple trainers and programs:
• Kayla Itsines’ BBG program includes high-intensity plyometric training using minimal space & equipment. Kayla has also developed a NEW program, BBG Stronger, a weights-based program for gym goers or BBG girls looking for a new challenge.
• Sjana Elise Earp’s BAM (Body and Mind) Yoga program includes vinyasa-style resistance flows and yin-based recovery to improve strength, flexibility and posture.
• Kelsey Wells’ SELF Post-Pregnancy program includes resistance workouts designed to increase core strength and improve posture for women post-pregnancy.

Along with 3 new programs and 2 new trainers that have joined the Sweat app, Sweat has also had a complete makeover and is more user friendly and advanced than ever.

Love the new Sweat? Rate us with 5 stars and share your love with the Community!

Sweat is changing the lives of women worldwide. Now, it's even better!

We listened to your feedback. The SWEAT and BBG Communities can enjoy continued updates to the look and feel of Sweat.

Love Sweat? Rate us with 5 stars and share your love with the Community!

Sweat is changing the lives of women worldwide. As always, we listened to your feedback and are proud to release a new update that is better than ever.

We believe your health and fitness is worth celebrating and are so excited to bring more trophies to the app, which we know you love.

• PROGRAM PHASES — each program is now divided into phases. At the end of a phase you will receive a new special trophy to share and will have the option to repeat the phase, continue to the next phase or change to one of our other amazing programs.

It's important that your progress is tracked accurately and is up to date at all times.

• PROGRESS PHOTOS — we have added better support for your local photos and now also have the option to store your photos on the Sweat Cloud allowing you to view them across all your devices.

Love Sweat? Rate us with 5 stars and share your love with the community!

Sweat’s mission is to positively impact the lives of as many women possible through health and fitness. In order to help achieve this we have worked hard to foster the world's largest women's fitness community as a support network. Now, for the first time ever, it’s available in our app. View weekly blogs from our contributors, trainers and Sweat, chat in discussion forums and get the support, motivation and education you need to succeed with your goals.

Of course, it’s all about that Sweat in your workouts. To finish the year off with a bang we just released extensions to our programs, BAM Yoga - Sjana Elise and BBG Stronger - Kayla Itsines to keep you going on your fitness journey. Also for the woman who wants to lift some weights in the gym, we have just released a brand new gym weights program by Kelsey Wells called PWR.

Love Sweat? Rate us 5 stars and share your love with the community.

Sweat is changing the lives of women worldwide. We have listened to your feedback and are proud to release an update with some exciting new features, including:

• Trainer Audio — you can now listen to your favourite trainer while you workout.
• Warm Ups — we've included cardio and movement-based routines that can help you get more out of your workout.
• Even more workout content for you to enjoy!

Love Sweat? Rate us 5 stars and share your love with the community?

Team Sweat is really excited to share our latest app updates, including more than 400 new workouts!

We’ve launched two new trainers and two new workout programs in the latest app release! Chontel Duncan and Stephanie Sanzo join as Sweat trainers, giving you more choice in your training style.

Get Fierce — Chontel provides strength and high-intensity workouts with variety in her first online program, Fierce! Perfect for those who love to change up their training in the gym, Chontel helps you to stay focused.

Ready to step-up your weight training? Stephanie gives you the tools to improve your weightlifting performance in Build, helping you to increase strength and develop muscle mass.

Also included in this update:

* Quick workouts — No time to exercise? Take advantage of Sweat’s new quick workouts feature, with flexible sessions that can be completed in just 10-15 minutes.

* Targeted workouts — Test out some of the targeted workouts on offer to help you focus on particular muscle groups, such as abs, glutes or shoulders.

* New look dashboard — Finding the workout style that suits you is easy with our redesigned dashboard. Move quickly between programs and personalise your routine.

* More workouts — Continue your journey with program extensions to BBG Stronger by Kayla Itsines and PWR by Kelsey Wells, update to access more weeks of workouts!

* Stay focused — we’ve added even more challenges and more recovery options so you can maximise your training and your results.

* Choose your fit — Select from at-home and gym-based programs to work out YOUR way. Get set to sweat with high-intensity workouts, yoga, powerbuilding, weight-training and post-pregnancy programs available.

Join the Sweat community and Sweat trainers Kayla Itsines, Kelsey Wells, Chontel Duncan, Stephanie Sanzo and Sjana Elise as you shape your best life. Get started to access more than 1600 workouts, 400 recipes, educational articles and so much more.

Love Sweat? Rate us 5 stars and share your love with the community!

We’ve listened to the feedback from the SWEAT and BBG Communities, and we’ve updated the app to give you a better workout experience.

This update includes:
• New workout experience
• Swipe forwards and back between exercises
• See what's up next in your workout
• Automatic progression through exercises, stretches and rest
• Preview all the exercises within the workout
• More visible timer
• Update settings during a workout
• Better feedback options
• Easy access to Apple Music & Spotify playlists
• Performance improvements
• More intuitive warm up experience

If you love the SWEAT app, leave us a 5-star review! Even if you’ve left feedback for a previous version of the app, we’d love to hear what you think of the new workout layout and improvements.

PWR 4.0 is now available! Find 12 new challenges and 12 new weeks of workouts in Kelsey Wells’ PWR program.

Also included:
• A brand new workout experience
• We’ve fixed the issue affecting the volume of your music during workouts

The SWEAT and BBG Communities can now start training with eight new weeks of BBG Beginner and Kayla’s Post-Pregnancy program!

BBG Beginner helps you to build baseline fitness with Kayla’s signature 28-minute workouts using low-intensity, low-impact exercises that prepare you for resistance training.

Kayla’s Post Pregnancy workout program helps women return to light exercise and rebuild their strength after having a baby, once they have clearance from their health professional.

Also included:
• A brand new workout experience
• PWR 4.0 now available

Love SWEAT? Rate us 5 stars and share your love with the community!

Thanks to your feedback, the SWEAT and BBG Communities can now enjoy continued updates throughout the app to make it even better.

This update brings you:

- More SWEAT programs on Apple Watch. At-home programs include BBG, PWR at Home, FIERCE at Home, LIFTING at Home, Kayla’s Post-Pregnancy and PWR Post-Pregnancy. Gym-based programs include BBG Stronger, PWR, FIERCE and BUILD (excl weight logging)

- Bug fixes and improvements

This update brings new:

- PWR at Home 3.0 includes 12 new weeks of strength training
